variations: what can you tell me about Sai
questions.answer: Sai is a Data Science graduate student at NJIT (graduating May 2025), specializing in AI-powered web development, data analysis, and R&D. He's skilled in Python, ReactJS, SEO optimization, and machine learning, with hands-on experience building data-driven solutions. He has a proven ability to lead teams, optimize workflows, and implement AI tools to solve complex problems.
Sai is currently based in Newark, New Jersey, United States, where he is pursuing his graduate studies at NJIT.

variations: can Sai work in the US
questions.answer: Yes, Sai will be eligible for OPT (Optional Practical Training) upon graduation in May 2025.

Sai has a strong educational background:

• Currently pursuing M.S. in Data Science at New Jersey Institute of Technology (NJIT)
- Expected graduation: May 2025
- GPA: 3.313/4.0
- Key courses: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, AI, Web Development

• B.E. in Computer Science from SCSVMV University (2019-2023)
- CGPA: 9.43/10
- Key courses: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Management
